resources.string: I\'m in basement canteen, I have extra rice and curry pack, anyone need that come to basement

Welcome to Meal Mate, a mobile application that connects people who have extra food with volunteers who are interested in taking the food. Our mission is to reduce food waste and promote food sharing in a safe and convenient way.

Our app is designed to make it easy for users to share their extra food with others. Whether you have leftovers from a party, or packaged food, Meal Mate makes it easy for you to find someone who can use it.

We believe that food should not go to waste when there are people who are hungry. By using our app, you are not only helping to reduce food waste, but you are also contributing to a more sustainable and equitable food system.

We take the safety of our users very seriously. That\'s why we have built in features that allow users to verify their identities, communicate securely, and rate their experiences with each other. We also provide guidelines and tips for safe food sharing through the app.

Welcome to Meal Mate, a mobile application that connects people who have extra food with volunteers who are interested in taking the food. These Terms and Conditions (Terms) govern your access to and use of the Meal Mate app and its services. By using the app, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with any of these Terms, you may not use the app.
The Meal Mate app is available to anyone who has access to it. By using the app, you represent and warrant that you have the legal capacity to enter into these Terms.

The Meal Mate app is designed to facilitate the sharing of extra food between individuals. The app does not guarantee the quality or safety of the food shared through the app, and users assume all risks associated with sharing and consuming food through the app.

You are solely responsible for any content that you post, upload, or otherwise make available through the Meal Mate app (User Content). You represent and warrant that your User Content does not infringe any third-party rights, including intellectual property rights and privacy rights.
